Episodes.Title: Divided We Stand
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Henry's orders to the 4077th to be on their best behavior when General Clayton sends a psychiatrist to evaluate them meet with mixed results. Will the team be broken up and sent to other units?

Episodes.Title: 5 O'Clock Charlie
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Keith Walker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Every day for the past six weeks, at 5:00 o'clock p.m. on the nose, a North Korean "washout from Kamikaze school" has let loose a bomb in the general direction of the hospital's sub-ammo dump. Very affectionately known as "Five O'...

Episodes.Title: Radar's Report
Episodes.Writer: Laurence Marks, Sheldon Keller, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Radar reports on the comedies and tragedies of a typical 4077th week while Majors Houlihan and Burns try to get Cpl. Klinger transferred and Hawkeye falls hard for a nurse.

Episodes.Title: For the Good of the Outfit
Episodes.Writer: Jerry Mayer, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye and Trapper discover that a nearby town has been shelled by U.S. forces. When they pursue the issue, the army resists accepting responsibility.

Episodes.Title: Dr. Pierce and Mr. Hyde
Episodes.Writer: Alan Alda, Robert Klane, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: After Hawkeye is kept awake in surgery for 3 days straight he decides to find out who started the war.

Episodes.Title: Kim
Episodes.Writer: Marc Mandel, Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: A wounded Korean boy captures the hearts of the 4077th especially Trapper who wants to adopt him.

Episodes.Title: L.I.P. (Local Indigenous Personnel)
Episodes.Writer: Carl Kleinschmitt, Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye helps a soon-to-be-discharged enlisted man who wants to marry a Korean girl and take her and their child back to the U.S.

Episodes.Title: The Trial of Henry Blake
Episodes.Writer: McLean Stevenson, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Henry's on trial on charges that Frank and Margaret brought against him. So that Hawkeye and Trapper can't help Henry, the Majors put them under house arrest.

Episodes.Title: Dear Dad... Three
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye pens another letter to his father during a 'typical' day at the 4077th.

Episodes.Title: The Sniper
Episodes.Writer: Richard Powell, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: The 4077th deals with more than the usual mayhem when a sniper opens fire on the camp.

Episodes.Title: Carry On, Hawkeye
Episodes.Writer: Bernard Dilbert, Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: All the surgeons except for Hawkeye, and most of the support staff except for Margaret, Radar, and Mulcahy come down with the flu. In this Korea-wide epidemic, they can't even find someone to come in and help with casualties.

Episodes.Title: The Incubator
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Hawkeye and Trapper desperately try to acquire an incubator for the camp. Captain Sloan, the Quartermaster, turns them down. A colonel with three incubators won't let them have one, and they cause an uproar at a general's press co...

Episodes.Title: Deal Me Out
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Radar hits a local with a jeep and a GI suffers from battle fatigue while Pierce and McIntyre clash with Frank Burns and the CID all during a poker game disguised as an officer's conference.

Episodes.Title: Hot Lips and Empty Arms
Episodes.Writer: Linda Bloodworth-Thomason, Mary Kay Place, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: A friend's letter causes Margaret to re-evaluate her life in the 4077th and request a transfer.

Episodes.Title: Officers Only
Episodes.Writer: Ed Jurist, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: In gratitude for Hawkeye and Trapper saving his son, a general donates an officer's club to the 4077th. Hawkeye and Trapper work to allow everyone access to the club.

Episodes.Title: Henry in Love
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Married family man Henry Blake falls in love with 20-year-old ex-cheerleader Nancy Sue Parker, who is less than half his age. Nancy visits Colonel Blake at the camp and comes on to Hawkeye while Henry's in surgery.

Episodes.Title: For Want of a Boot
Episodes.Writer: Sheldon Keller, Larry Gelbart, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: After months of waiting, Hawkeye finds that it may take more than a requisition form to get a new pair of boots.

Episodes.Title: Operation Noselift
Episodes.Writer: Erik Tarloff, Paul Richards, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Another day, another complaint to Gen. Mitchell, compliments of Hotlips, Inc. and Henry is tired of their constant abuse. To make matters worse, Private Danny Baker keeps going AWOL. With the help of Fr. Mulcahy, Hawkeye and Trapp...

Episodes.Title: The Chosen People
Episodes.Writer: Laurence Marks, Sheldon Keller, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: A Korean family claims that the 4077th is set up on their farm and wants the unit to move; a Korean girl names Radar as the father of her child.

Episodes.Title: As You Were
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Gene Reynolds
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: The team delivers a baby, handles casualties and operates on Frank Burns' hernia during a power outage while Radar tries to divert friendly mortar fire falling too close to the camp.

Episodes.Title: Crisis
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: When enemy action cuts the supply lines to the 4077th in the middle of a freezing Korean winter, the unit struggles with a shortage of supplies and heating fuel.

Episodes.Title: George
Episodes.Writer: John W. Regier, Gary Markowitz, Larry Gelbart
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: A decorated GI confides to Hawkeye that he was beaten by his own unit for being gay but Frank Burns is outraged when he finds out from another source and tries to have the soldier dishonorably discharged.

Episodes.Title: Mail Call
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: Mail call yields goodies like photos and cookies (Trapper) and a huge knitted sweater (Hawkeye) but Henry gets only canceled checks. Frank's stock portfolio doubled since the war began but when he tells the guys they are less than...

Episodes.Title: A Smattering of Intelligence
Episodes.Writer: Larry Gelbart, Laurence Marks, Richard Hooker
Episodes.Actors: Alan Alda, Wayne Rogers, McLean Stevenson
Episodes.Plot: A helicopter crash introduces the 4077 to Colonel Sam Flagg, the well-built (says Hotlips) paranoid with a broken arm who refuses all painkillers. Colonel Flagg (who can also be identified as Major Brooks, Lt. Carter, Ensign Troy ...
